attributes.action: instruct the Sec. of State not to sign any closure notice or proposal submitted by Kirklees Council with respect to Castle Hall School , Mirfield
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Castle Hall is a popular and successful foundation school in Mirfield, West Yorkshire.

Under plans for the Govts BSF programme Kirklees Council have indicated they wish to close the school.

Such action we understand will ulimately require sec of State approval.

We believe that if a firm statement is given that such approval will not be granted then Kirklees will have to bring forward other more acceptable plans for the future of education in Mirfield

government_responses.details:
